page.title: 02Our Visit to Westermill Farm
page.content: When we arrived at the farm we got out of the minibus and waited for our teachers to tell us what we were doing. They said we were going for a walk. We went through the farm yard which included some dogs, chickens and ducks. Then we came to some fields with cows in which was the start of our walk. In the field we saw a white cow which had just had a calf. We had to follow some red arrows through fields and because Mr. Smith couldn't find them we went the wrong way. Along our route we passed meadows and pastures and climbed up to the open moor where we found an ancient standing stone.
